attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hello Mr Brown,
What is being done about the plight of persecuted Christians in Muslim countries.
 and i hope my voice of concern is listened to.We don't see news about their Plight,only when non Christians are Persecuted do we see any news about them
Pressure should put to these countries for Equality for Christians,i am sure the U.N has pollicies and laws as such.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
